text: Manganese carbonate, also known as manganese(II) carbonate, is a chemical compound. It is a brownish powder with a chemical formula of MnCO3. It can be heated to produce manganese(II) oxide and carbon dioxide. It is made by reacting a soluble manganese compound such as manganese(II) chloride with sodium carbonate. ==Related pages== *Manganese *Manganese(IV) oxide *Potassium carbonate Category:Manganese compounds
title: Manganese carbonate
